#include <functional>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <map>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <utility>
#include <vector>
#include <cstring>
#include <ctime>
#include <numeric>

using namespace std;

#define dbg(e) cout<<(#e)<<" : "<<e<<"\n"
#define SI ({int x;scanf("%d",&x);x;})
#define set(v,i) memset(v,i,sizeof(v))
#define each(i,c) for(__typeof((c).begin()) i = (c).begin();i!=(c).end();i++)
#define REP(i,n) for(int i(0);i<(n);i++)
#define all(x) x.begin(),x.end()
#define sz(x) int((x).size())
#define pb  push_back
#define mp make_pair

typedef pair<int,int> pi;
typedef pair<int,double> pid;
typedef long long LL;
typedef vector<int> VI;

int main()
{
    int t=SI;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n=SI,m=SI;
        VI indeg(n,0),hei(n,0);
        vector< VI > adj(n);
        REP(i,m)
        {
            int a=SI,b=SI;
            adj[a].pb(b);
            indeg[b]++;
        }
        queue<int> q;
        REP(i,sz(indeg))
        {
            if(!indeg[i])
                q.push(i);
        }
        while(!q.empty())
        {
            int u=q.front();q.pop();
            REP(i,sz(adj[u]))
            {
                int v=adj[u][i];
                indeg[v]--;
                if(indeg[v]==0)
                {
                    q.push(v);
                    hei[v]=hei[u]+1;
                }
            }
        }
        int maxi=0;
        REP(i,sz(hei))
            maxi=max(maxi,hei[i]);
        printf("%d\n",maxi+1);
    }
}
